Title: Slaves of Las Vegas
Plot: Grissom and Catherine investigate the apparent violent death of a woman found in a sandbox.  Warrick and Sara are called to a crime scene to investigate a shooting, which initially appears to have taken place during a robbery.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Amy Weber, Keilana Smith, Melinda Clarke, Kelly Rowan, Mitchell Whitfield, Amaury Nolasco, Perry Anzilotti, John Benjamin Hickey, Stacey Dash, Manny Suarez, Tracy Vilar, Nicola Hindshaw, Danica Stewart, Suyun Kim
